item.title: Pavement Slab Sticking Out 10inch Damages Car!, 30th August
item.description:
Theres is 2 uneven pavement slabs sticking out about 10inch up from the ground. This road is a 2 way road with parking on both sides, a busy street aswelll as there are row of shops on both sides. Ive pulled into the bay to park up not seeing these pavement slabs and driven over it. Ive heard a loud thud and i instantly stopped got out the vehicle and 2 bystanders were shocked telling me didn't i see it, and i quoted â€˜ london construction for you. I have reported the damaged pavement on the phone to out of hours as its a saturday. However my concern is now the damage to my vehicle. Its a fair bit of damage to the bottom of the vehicle.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 101, Great Suffolk Street, The Borough, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road access blocked by dumped fencing perhaps left after carnival, 30th August
item.description:
Fencing obstructing entrance to Northumberland Place from Artesian Road preventing access to houses, parking for residents and deliveries. This has been going on for several days please remove to allow us to have unimpeded use of our homes. We cannot see any council authorisation for this.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Artesian Road, Bayswater, London
Report on FixMyStreet
